thread.title: 10 Reasons You Can Cancel Your Trip to Europe and Head to Napa Instead
thread.title_full: 10 Reasons You Can Cancel Your Trip to Europe and Head to Napa Instead

author: Matthew Rodrigues
title: 10 Reasons You Can Cancel Your Trip to Europe and Head to Napa Instead
text:
Best Things to Do in Napa 10 Reasons You Can Cancel Your Trip to Europe and Head to Napa Instead February 6, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 10 Reasons You Can Cancel Your Trip to Europe and Head to Napa Instead 
OK, so I don't really want you to cancel a trip to Europe. If you have the opportunity and can afford it, get your butt on a plane and experience a world filled with rich culture. However, many of us don't have the resources or the time to plan a trip overseas — but have no fear. Napa, CA, is waiting for you , and it is a wonderland. Whenever I visit the Napa Valley area , I feel as if I am transported to the most beautiful regions of Europe, and I know you'll feel the same way.
